Notes: Provides NOT gate logic for switches. There are two possible outcomes. If SW_B and SW_A are activated, SW_A will be deactivated. If SW_B and SW_A are deactivated, SW_A will be activated.

SW_A.Description: Secondary input, also functions as output.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
